navAcceptTerms.title: Accept terms of use
navAcceptTerms.description: By accessing and using Speedchars, you agree to adhere to all the terms and conditions set forth herein. Please read this document carefully, as your acceptance implies your full agreement with the rules, responsibilities, and limitations of the service. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, we kindly ask you to discontinue your use of the service.

navUseOfService.title: Use of service
navUseOfService.description: Speedchars is a sophisticated text analysis tool that leverages the OpenAI API (GPT-4o model) to provide detailed insights and information about texts entered by users. The service offers metrics such as character counts, word counts, sentence counts, paragraphs, and other statistics to help evaluate and refine your content. Please note that the results should be considered as supportive guidance and not as a substitute for professional review.

navLimitationOfUse.title: Limitation of use
navLimitationOfUse.description: Speedchars is not responsible for the accuracy, relevance, or appropriate application of the generated analyses. The information provided is offered solely for guidance and should be independently verified by the user before making any significant decisions. Users should avoid using the service for the following purposes:

list.1: Publishing, analyzing, or disseminating content that is illegal, offensive, or inappropriate.
list.2: Violating the rights of third parties, including copyright, privacy, and intellectual property rights.
list.3: Attempting to bypass usage restrictions, such as the daily limit on analyses.

list.1: We use cookies to manage and limit the use of our AI to 5 analyses per day. This measure is essential to prevent abuse and ensure the efficiency of the API.
list.2: Cookies are stored locally on your device and we do not collect any personal information from them. They are used solely to monitor access and enhance your user experience.
list.3: By continuing to use Speedchars, you agree to the use of cookies as described above, understanding that their use contributes to the service's security and performance.

navRestrictUseOfService.title: Restriction of use of the service
navRestrictUseOfService.description: To ensure an ethical and secure environment, please use Speedchars solely for lawful purposes. Users are prohibited from:

list.1: Publishing, analyzing, or disseminating content that is illegal, offensive, discriminatory, or that promotes hate. Content that incites violence or undermines the moral integrity of individuals is strictly forbidden.
list.2: Infringing upon the rights of third parties, including copyright, intellectual property, and privacy rights. Reproducing or distributing content without proper authorization may result in legal repercussions.
list.3: Attempting to circumvent or manipulate usage restrictions, including the daily analysis limit. Any fraudulent activity or attempts to bypass these restrictions will be immediately blocked and may be reported to the appropriate authorities.

navChangeTermsOfUse.title: Change terms of use
navChangeTermsOfUse.description: Speedchars reserves the right to modify, update, or revise these terms of use at any time without prior notice, in order to accommodate legal, technological, or operational changes. We recommend that you review these terms periodically to stay informed about any updates.

navIntroduction.title: Introduction
navIntroduction.description: This Privacy Policy details the commitment of Speedchars to protect and secure your data. Here, we explain in a transparent manner how we collect, use, store, and protect the information provided by users when using our services. By accessing and using Speedchars, you agree that your information will be treated as described in this document.

navDataCollection.title: Data Collection
navDataCollection.description: Speedchars is committed to protecting the privacy of its users and does not collect identifiable personal information. However, to ensure the efficient operation of the service and improve your experience, we may collect non-identifiable and anonymous data such as access records, navigation patterns, and usage data. These data help us continuously improve the performance and functionality of our service.

navCookies.title: Cookies
navCookies.description: Cookies are small files stored locally on your device that assist in personalizing and optimizing your navigation experience. At Speedchars, we use cookies to monitor access to the service, manage the use of specific features (such as text analysis with AI), and store user preferences. The main uses of cookies include:

list.1: Control the use of the AI analysis feature, allowing up to 15 analyses per day.
list.2: Analyze access behavior to identify opportunities for improvement and optimize service performance.
list.3: Store user settings and preferences, providing a more personalized and efficient experience.

navCookies.note: Note: You can adjust cookie settings in your browser or disable them. However, disabling them may impact some essential service features, compromising the complete usage experience.

navDataSecurity.title: Data Security
navDataSecurity.description: The security of our users' data is a priority for Speedchars. We adopt robust technical and organizational measures to protect any data collected, even temporarily. Text analyses are processed in real time using the OpenAI API (GPT-4o-mini model), ensuring a secure, effective, and data protection best practices.

navRights.title: User Rights
navRights.description: Even though we do not store personal information permanently, we recognize the user's right to transparency and control over data that may be processed temporarily. If you have any questions, need clarifications, or want more information about how your data is handled, please contact us. We are always available to attend any request related to privacy and data protection.

navChangePrivacy.title: Change Privacy Policy
navChangePrivacy.description: Speedchars reserves the right to modify, update, or revise this Privacy Policy at any time without prior notice, to comply with legal, technological, or operational changes. We recommend that you review this document periodically to stay informed about any updates.

about.title: About Speedchars
about.description: Speedchars is a platform that allows you to analyze texts in real time, providing detailed statistics about characters, words, and sentences. In addition, we offer an AI feature to help with text analysis and improve text, limited to 15 uses per day for each user.

what_is_speedchars.title: What is Speedchars?
what_is_speedchars.description: Speedchars is a platform that allows you to analyze texts in real time, providing detailed statistics about characters, words, and sentences. In addition, we offer an AI feature to help with text analysis and improve text, limited to 15 uses per day for each user.

how_it_works.title: How it works?
how_it_works.description: Follow these steps to use Speedchars:

steps.1: Enter the text you want to analyze in the text field.
steps.2: Click on the 'Analyze' button to get the text statistics.
steps.3: Click on the 'Improve' button to use the AI feature to improve the text.
steps.4: You can configure the AI settings to improve the text according to your needs.

why_use_speedchars.title: Why use Speedchars?
why_use_speedchars.description: Speedchars offers several advantages to users:

benefits.2: AI feature to help with text analysis and improve text.
benefits.3: Automatic character, word, and sentence counting, as well as the ability to filter the counting of characters, words, and sentences according to the user's needs.

about_section.title: Sobre o Speedchars
about_section.description: O Speedchars é uma ferramenta de análise de texto avançada que utiliza a API da OpenAI (modelo GPT-4o-mini) para oferecer insights detalhados e informações sobre os textos inseridos pelos usuários.
